thread.title: FIFA says interest in expanded Club World Cup

title: FIFA says interest in expanded Club World Cup
text:
FIFA says interest in expanded Club World Cup 11:21am EDT - 01:33 
FIFA president Gianni Infantino has confirmed that companies have shown an interest in backing an expanded Club World Cup. As Julian Satterthwaite reports, investors are said to be offering tens of billions of dollars for the event. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
FIFA president Gianni Infantino has confirmed that companies have shown an interest in backing an expanded Club World Cup. As Julian Satterthwaite reports, investors are said to be offering tens of billions of dollars for the event.
